title: Drawing, "Study of a Nude Child", ca. 1775
medium: Black, red and white chalk, graphite on gray paper.
signed: Signed in graphite, left margin: Mergolo
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Turned to the right. In the background, at left, a tree.

Drawing, "Study of a Nude Child", ca. 1775.
ca. 1775. Black, red and white chalk, graphite on gray paper.. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-6789.
